abstract: Richard F. Zannino, the former chief executive of Dow Jones, is joining buyout shop CCMP Capital Advisors, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Richard F. Zannino, the former chief executive of Dow Jones, is joining buyout shop CCMP Capital Advisors, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Richard F. Zannino, the former chief executive of Dow Jones whose first meeting with Rupert Murdoch set News Corporation‘s $5 billion deal to buy the company in motion, will now be able to put his deal-making skills to use in the world of private equity.

headline.main: Ex-Chief at Dow Jones Is Turning to Private Equity

abstract: The market’s buoyant mood spread beyond technology as investors latched onto hopes that consumer spending may recover in time to give the economy a kick start.
snippet: The market’s buoyant mood spread beyond technology as investors latched onto hopes that consumer spending may recover in time to give the economy a kick start.
lead_paragraph: Stocks shot higher on Wednesday after investors had a night to digest a stronger-than-expected financial report from Intel.

headline.main: Intel’s Earnings Help Drive a Rally
headline.print_headline: Intel’s Earnings Help Drive a Rally
